bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Deaths that must be reported by anyone

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: In this section, medical assistance in dying has the same meaning as in section 241.1 of the Criminal Code.

For the purposes of section 2 (1) (g) of the Act, circumstances in which a person must report a death in accordance with section 2 of the Act include that the person has reason to believe the death resulted from the deceased person having received medical assistance in dying purportedly provided in accordance with section 241.2 of the Criminal Code.
